page.title: 15Concern-Oldmeldrum Housing
page.content: Meldrum and Bourtie Coummunity Council have made a stand to prevent uncontrolled housing development in Oldmeldrum, based on Grampian Region's projected need up to the year 2001. The 1980 Aberdeen area Structure Plan gave Oldmeldrum responsibility of 300 more houses by 1991, without supportive infrastucture. Meldrum and Bourtie residents protested at a pubic meeting but the figure was not changed. The 1985 Structure Plan now forecasts 750 additional houses for Oldmeldrum by the year 2001. The Community Council has indicated to Gordon District that it will accept no more than 350. It presents among its reasons the fact that when the oil-related industry wanes Oldmeldrum will have too many derelict structures on its hands.
